QA_Engineer.name: QA Engineer Specialized Onboarding
QA_Engineer.description: Tailored onboarding for Quality Assurance Engineers

items.title: Complete paperwork & QA team introduction
items.description: Fill out required forms and get introduced to QA team structure
items.ai_reasoning: Personalized for QA team introduction vs generic paperwork

items.title: Set up QA testing tools accounts
items.description: Create accounts for TestRail, Jira, Selenium, and PostMan
items.ai_reasoning: QA-specific tools vs generic system accounts

items.title: QA methodology & testing frameworks orientation
items.description: Deep dive into MoneyForward's QA standards and testing approach
items.ai_reasoning: QA-focused training vs general company orientation

items.title: Meet Cherry (QA Manager) and QA buddy
items.description: Introduction with QA Manager Cherry and assigned QA mentor
items.ai_reasoning: Role-specific manager and QA buddy vs generic manager meeting

items.title: Review QA Testing Guidelines & Quality Standards
items.description: Study QA-specific policies and testing documentation
items.ai_reasoning: QA-specific documentation vs generic company policies

items.title: Hands-on testing environment setup
items.description: Configure local testing environment and run sample test cases
items.ai_reasoning: QA-specific environment setup not in generic checklist

items.title: Shadow senior QA engineer on live testing
items.description: Observe real testing scenarios and learn team workflow
items.ai_reasoning: Role-specific shadowing experience

AA_Engineer.name: Advanced Analytics Engineer Onboarding

items.title: Complete paperwork & AA team welcome
items.description: Administrative setup with personalized AA team introduction

items.title: Set up analytics toolchain access
items.description: Configure access to Tableau, BigQuery, Databricks, and Jupyter environments

items.title: Data analytics methodology training
items.description: Learn MoneyForward's approach to data science and business intelligence
items.ai_reasoning: Analytics-focused training vs general orientation

items.title: Meet Dave (AA Manager) and analytics mentor
items.description: Connect with AA Manager Dave and assigned senior analytics buddy
items.ai_reasoning: Analytics team leadership vs generic manager meeting

items.title: Review data privacy & analytics standards
items.description: Study data governance, privacy protocols, and ML development guidelines
items.ai_reasoning: Data-specific compliance vs general policies

items.title: Explore current analytics projects
items.description: Review ongoing projects and understand team's business impact areas
items.ai_reasoning: Analytics project context not in generic checklist

items.title: Set up development environment
items.description: Configure Python, ML libraries, and connect to data sources
items.ai_reasoning: Analytics-specific development setup

items.title: Senior-level paperwork & SCI architecture overview

items.title: Meet Ness (SCI Manager) and technical leadership team
items.description: Introduction with SCI Manager Ness, Bamboo, and other senior technical leads

items.title: Review engineering standards & security protocols
items.description: Study advanced engineering practices, API guidelines, and security best practices

items.title: Infrastructure monitoring & incident response training
items.description: Learn monitoring systems, alerting, and senior-level incident response procedures

items.title: Set up development & deployment environments
items.description: Configure local development, staging access, and CI/CD pipeline permissions

items.title: Budget & resource planning overview
